roleset.name: run away!
roleset.note: RETREAT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retreat' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.No comparison. VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls 51.1-2, 82-3. (from retreat.01-v)
RETREAT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on retreat-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls escape-51.1-2, withdraw-82-3. (from retreat.01-n)

roles.note: argA, causal agent of retreating, not expected to occur in addition to arg1. (from retreat.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: According to Salomon Brothers' ``stub'' stock index of 20 companies whose debt is giant compared with shareholder equity, investors-1 are already beginning *trace*-1 to retreat from shares of debt-laden companies.

example.name: with causal agent
example.text: John retreated his toy knights from the deadly bunny rabbit.

example.name: both args
example.text: He told lawmakers it would not trigger a U.S. retreat from the Persian Gulf ,

example.name: both args, metaphorical retreat
example.text: Turkey's parliamentary speaker has defended his retreat from an initiative to establish a conciliation commission in Parliament...
example.arg: from an initiative to establish a conciliation commission in Parliament...

roleset.name: quantifiable downward movement, quantifiable (inanimate) downward motion
roleset.note: RETREAT-V NOTES: It can be very difficult to distinguish between these two senses, butit's crucial that you do so.VN classes fit better with other sense. (from retreat.02-v)
RETREAT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on retreat-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls calibratable_cos-45.6. (from retreat.02-n)

role.descr: attribute of arg1 actually in decline (if in addition to arg1)

example.name: clear
example.text: Other stocks hurt by earnings-related selling included Tandy, which dropped 1 3/8 to 44, and Eaton, which *trace* retreated 2 1/2 to 57 1/2.

example.name: somewhat ambiguous
example.text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 41.60 to 2645.08 even though some late selling caused the market to retreat from session highs.

example.name: arg1
example.text: A big reason for the chemical price retreat is overexpansion .

example.name: with EXT
example.text: But we'll need to see a price retreat of at least thirty to forty dollars
example.arg: of at least thrity to forty dollars

example.name: with arg5
example.text: But what about the speculators what role might they play in the present price retreat of oil?

roleset.name: vacation-type retreat
roleset.note: RETREAT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on Ontonotes retreat-n.04, noun corpus examples. No corresponding VNcls. (from retreat.03-n)

example.name: arg1 and 2
example.text: Their team building retreat concluded with each small team creating a Dream image of their most desired future.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Our company went on a corporate retreat to a wonderful vacation villa in Jamaica.
example.arg: to a wonderful vacation villa in Jamaica
